citances.sentence: 51 After GenRx sought interlocutory relief in these proceedings ( GenRx Pty Limited v Les Laboratoires Servier [2007] FCA 442 ; (2007) 71 IPR 606) , Servier undertook not to distribute the stamp further and has issued to doctors a second form of stamp. The text of that stamp, about which GenRx does not complain, is:
